item.title: Issue navigations in inteliJ
item.author: Rafał Kobel
item.description: I use tools from JetBrains a lot in my work. One of the things that I like about their software is the well-performing version control system management tool. In addition to an efficient overview of the code history, we also have a lot of options to manage it in an easy and fun way. Today I will present a simple way to make links in the commit descriptions to allow faster navigation from the history to the page with the bug you are viewing.
